message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90, you get 10.  Hope you'll agree!
Let's meet in the middle! 50/50 seems fair to me.
Ok, I'll compromise.  60 for me, 40 for you.  This way we both get something decent, and we can avoid going through more rounds.
I'm willing to give up a bit more. 45 for me, 55 for you. Let's make a deal!
